43.ara-name: كتاب الأدب عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Amr bin Shu'aib:from his father, from his grandfather: "The Prophet (ﷺ) prohibited plucking gray hair. And he said: "It is the Muslim's light

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي النَّهْىِ عَنْ نَتْفِ الشَّيْبِ،
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Prohibition Of Plucking Gray Hair
